text: Overhead lines or overhead wires are used to transmit electrical energy to trams, trolleybuses or trains at a distance from the energy supply point. This may be abbreviated to OHL or OHLE for OverHead Line Equipment. == Related pages == * Bow collector * Pantograph * Trolley pole * Railway electrification Category:Rail infrastructure Category:Rail technologies Category:Electric rail transport Category:Green vehicles Category:Tram technology
title: Overhead lines
